cookieConsent.notice.message: Unaweza kubatilisha vidakuzi wakati wowote chini ya ukurasa.

cookieConsent.subtitle.message: Tunatumia vidakuzi kwenye tovuti yetu. Zinatusaidia kukufahamu kidogo na jinsi unavyotumia tovuti yetu. Hii hutusaidia kukupa hali ya utumiaji yenye thamani zaidi na iliyoundwa mahsusi kwako na kwa wengine.

errors.unknown.message: Hitilafu fulani imetokea. Tafadhali jaribu kuwasilisha fomu tena

misc.embargoMessage.description: Embargo means that the story is not allowed to be shared before the specified date

misc.toggleMobileNavigation.description: A tooltip for a button that toggles the mobile menu on the web page

noStories.subtitle.message: Rudi baadaye ili kuona hadithi mpya.

notFound.subtitle.message: Ikiwa uliandika URL mwenyewe, angalia tahajia kwenye upau wa anwani.

search.action.description: The word should be treated as a verb (e.g. a Search action on a button)

search.noResults.message: Hakuna kilichopatikana! Tafadhali jaribu neno lingine la utafutaji!

search.title.description: The word should be treated as a noun (e.g. a title of the Search section)

serverError.subtitle.message: Jaribu kuonyesha upya ukurasa au urudi baadaye kidogo.

subscription.disclaimer.description: The variables are replaced with text from `actions.subscribe` and `subscription.privacyPolicy` messages along with a link to the privacy policy.
subscription.disclaimer.message: Kwa kubonyeza "{subscribe}" Ninathibitisha kuwa nimesoma na kukubaliana na {privacyPolicyLink}.

subscription.formTitle.message: Pata masasisho kwenye kisanduku chako cha barua pepe
